General.Name: Mesiniaga Bhd
General.Description: Mesiniaga Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology products and services in Malaysia. Its products include the Malaysian obstetric monitoring system (MyMOMS), a mobile app that serves as an antenatal digital logbook for the benefit of the mother and the clinician; Chup, a mobile app to book appointments; NetSysCare to monitor the health of network devices, servers, and other critical equipment; MB cloud, an in-country managed enterprise cloud; MB Hybrid, a computing as-a-service solution; MB Evergreen, an on-premise private cloud; and LOFT, a platform that offers asset management capability of end-user digital devices. The company also offers XyberGuard, a cybersecurity monitoring service; network assessment, design, and optimization advisory; network implementation and migration; and network support and managed services, as well as IT maintenance services; change management; and project management services. Further, it provides strategic information technology outsourcing services, as well as sells networking cables and related products. The company serves clients in telecommunications, financial services organizations, manufacturing industries, private enterprises, and the education and government sectors. Mesiniaga Berhad was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Subang Jaya, Malaysia.
